item.title: 南航据称酝酿货运部门香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国南方航空股份有限公司（China Southern Airlines Co.【原文：China Southern Airlines Co. is exploring a Hong Kong initial public offering for its cargo business after shelving plans to do so in Shanghai, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 在关税影响到来之前，中国经济增长超出预期
item.description: 2025 年前三个月，中国经济增长速度超过预期，但由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收巨额关税，中国经济前景正在迅速恶化。【原文：China’s economy expanded at a faster pace than expected in the first three months of 2025, though its outlook is deteriorating rapidly due to Donald Trump’s massive tariffs.】

item.title: KKR 支持的 InCred 私人信贷部门将融资 1.74 亿美元
item.description: 据一位公司高管透露，KKR & Co.支持的影子贷款机构InCred Financial Services的信贷部门计划通过新基金筹集150亿卢比（1.74亿美元），以满足日益增长的私人信贷需求。【原文：The credit arm of KKR & Co.-backed shadow lender InCred Financial Services plans to raise 15 billion rupees ($174 million) through a new fund to tap growing demand for private credit, according to a company executive.】

item.title: 中国对冲基金 Greenwoods 在股市下跌之际增持港股
item.description: 一家规模达 200 亿美元的中国对冲基金利用上周香港股市的大跌增加了风险敞口，押注中国政府的政策支持将推动股价上涨，并在美国市场失去吸引力时吸引全球投资者。【原文：A $20 billion Chinese hedge fund used last week’s selloff in Hong Kong stocks to boost exposure, betting that Beijing’s policy support will drive shares higher and lure global investors as US markets lose appeal.】

item.title: 美国加征关税前，中国 3 月房价跌势有所缓解
item.description: 在中国为唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战做好准备之际，中国的房价跌幅在 3 月份因支持政策而再次放缓。【原文：China’s home price decline eased again in March on the back of support policies, as the country readies for Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: Keyaki Capital 启动日本首个在线私人资产平台
item.description: 据一份声明称，日本金融服务公司 Keyaki Capital 推出了该国首个面向高净值投资者的在线私人资产投资平台。【原文：Japanese financial services firm Keyaki Capital has launched the country’s first online private asset investment platform for high-net-worth investors, according to a statement.】

item.title: 日本长期债券在大幅下跌后延续反弹势头
item.description: 随着美国国债市场波动性的缓解，以及日本央行行长上田一夫建议对美国提高关税采取政策应对措施，日本 30 年期债券反弹。【原文：Japan’s 30-year bonds rallied as volatility eased in the US Treasuries market and Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda suggested a policy response to higher US tariffs.】

item.title: 中国将公布稳健增长报告，但关税威胁 5%目标
item.description: 上海浦东陆家嘴金融区的建筑。摄影师：Qilai Shen/Bloomberg【原文：Buildings in Pudong's Lujiazui Financial District in Shanghai. Photographer: Qilai Shen/Bloomberg】

item.title: 英伟达供应商库存因中国最新出口限制措施而下降
item.description: 芯片制造商英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）称，美国政府将开始要求向中国出口其 H20 芯片必须获得许可，限制措施升级后，该公司的供应商在亚洲的股价出现下跌。【原文：Suppliers to Nvidia Corp. saw share price declines in Asia after the chipmaker said the US government will begin requiring a license to export its H20 chips to China, an escalation of restrictions.】

item.title: Alvarez & Marsal 认为贸易风险导致泰国房地产陷入困境
item.description: 美国咨询公司 Alvarez & Marsal Inc.认为，由于全球贸易摩擦和住宅供应过剩等不利因素，今年东南亚房地产行业面临的风险最大。【原文：US advisory firm Alvarez & Marsal Inc. sees the real estate sector the most at risk in Southeast Asia this year due to headwinds such as global trade frictions and a glut of residences.】

item.title: 贸易战扩大助力避险需求，黄金再创新高
item.description: 随着特朗普政府继续推进可能扩大全面贸易战的调查，黄金升至历史新高，从而刺激了避险需求。【原文：Gold rose to record high as the Trump administration pressed ahead with probes that could broaden a sweeping trade war, boosting demand for havens.】

item.title: 政府限制拨款，新西兰央行将审查支出和人员编制
item.description: 新西兰中央银行在与政府达成一项五年期融资方案后，将对其支出和人员配置水平进行审查。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank will review its spending and staffing levels after agreeing a five-year funding package with the government that was smaller than initially sought.】

item.title: 日发控股公司接受创始人家族的私有化提议
item.description: 新加坡肉类生产商 Japfa Ltd.的股东已经批准了该公司已故创始人的家族成员提出的将公司私有化的申请，为公司在 6 月 3 日前后退市铺平了道路。【原文：Japfa Ltd. shareholders have approved a bid by the family members of the Singapore meat producer’s late founder to take the business private, paving way for a delisting on or around June 3.】

item.title: 石油供应预期稳定，贸易战前景黯淡
item.description: 由于对供应过剩的预期以及世界两大经济体之间的贸易战影响了需求前景，石油在周二小幅下跌后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied after a modest decline on Tuesday as expectations for a glut, and the trade war between the world’s two biggest economies weighed on the demand outlook.】

item.title: 日本央行上田称特朗普关税可能引发政策应对：产经新闻
item.description: 日本《产经新闻》周三报道称，日本央行行长上田一夫表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税运动已将经济带入 "糟糕的情景"，可能迫使央行做出政策反应。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said President Donald Trump’s tariff campaign has brought the economy to a ‘bad scenario’ that could force the central bank to make a policy response, the Sankei newspaper reported Wednesday.】

item.title: 菲律宾货币市场集团称银行对贸易风险持谨慎态度
item.description: 代表固定收益交易商的组织负责人表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统不断变化的关税攻势给菲律宾良好的经济基本面蒙上了阴影，并可能使银行在部署资金时保持选择性。【原文：President Donald Trump’s ever-changing tariff onslaught is overshadowing the Philippines’ sound economic fundamentals and will likely keep banks selective in deploying funds, according to the head of the group representing fixed-income traders.】

item.title: 贸易战愈演愈烈，前麦肯锡中国研究员创办新公司
item.description: 这位麦肯锡公司在中国扩张的前设计师正在创办自己的城市发展项目咨询公司，尽管不断加深的贸易裂痕引发了对全球经济增长的担忧。【原文：The former architect of McKinsey & Co.’s expansion in China is starting her own advisory firm for urban development projects, even as deepening trade rifts raise concerns about global growth.】

item.title: 美国期货因英伟达受限和矿产调查而下滑：市场综述
item.description: 在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）表示政府将对其对华出口设置新的限制，以及唐纳德-特朗普总统下令调查对关键矿产征收关税的可能性之后，美国期货价格暴跌。【原文：US futures slumped after Nvidia Corp. said the government was setting new limits on its exports to China and President Donald Trump ordered a probe into potential tariffs on critical minerals.】

item.title: 受旋风影响，力拓铁矿石出货量降至六年新低
item.description: 力拓集团第一季度铁矿石发货量同比下降 9%，创六年来新低，原因是热带气旋中断了其澳大利亚主要码头的出口。【原文：Rio Tinto Group’s first-quarter iron ore shipments fell 9% from the year before to a six-year low, after tropical cyclones disrupted exports from its key Australian terminal.】

item.title: 人民币兑欧元汇率创十年新低 贸易流动面临更多风险
item.description: 中国人民币兑欧元汇率跌至十多年来的最低点，而美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税大潮正威胁着这个世界第二大经济体的贸易流向。【原文：China’s yuan has slumped to the lowest in more than a decade against the euro just as President Donald Trump’s tariff deluge threatens to re-route trade flows from the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 暴雨导致淡水河谷铁矿石产量下降
item.description: 世界顶级铁矿石供应商之一淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）的铁矿石产量低于预期，反映了季节性强降雨的影响。【原文：Vale SA, one of the world’s top iron ore suppliers, churned out less than expected of the commodity, reflecting seasonal heavy rainfall.】

item.title: 英伟达称对华出口新限制将导致 55 亿美元损失
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）表示，美国政府正在限制向中国出口其 H20 芯片，这将阻碍该公司为应对此前的限制而设计的产品线。【原文：Nvidia Corp. said the US government is restricting the export of its H20 chip to China, hamstringing a product line that the company had designed to meet previous curbs.】

item.title: 设计软件初创公司 Figma 秘密申请 IPO
item.description: 在与 Adobe 公司的合并计划告吹一年多后，Figma 这家生产应用程序设计和协作软件的初创公司已秘密申请首次公开募股。【原文：Figma, a startup that makes app design and collaboration software, has filed confidentially for an initial public offering, over a year after a planned merger with Adobe Inc. fell apart.】

item.title: 巴西将在市场怀疑声中实现 2026 年财政盈余目标
item.description: 巴西政府表示，明年将寻求预算盈余，这很可能会引发与投资者的冲突，因为投资者对总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）的财政责任承诺持怀疑态度。【原文：Brazil’s government said it will seek a budget surplus next year, likely setting up a clash with investors who are skeptical about President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s commitment to fiscal responsibility.】

item.title: 交易员转向中性，国债动荡趋于平静
item.description: 过去一周，交易商因美国国债遭遇数十年来最严重的损失而大幅削减期货赌注，在评估唐纳德-特朗普总统关税政策的下一步措施时转为中性立场。【原文：Traders reeling from the steepest losses in decades in US government debt slashed futures wagers aggressively over the past week, moving to a neutral position as they assessed the next steps in President Donald Trump’s tariff policies.】

item.title: 哈佛的数十亿美元经得起特朗普的联邦拨款之争吗？
item.description: 哈佛大学的资产负债表经过加固，可以抵御突如其来的打击，但在与特朗普政府的交锋中，哈佛大学正面临着前所未有的考验。【原文：Harvard University’s balance sheet — fortified to withstand surprise blows — is facing an unprecedented test as it faces off with the Trump administration.】

item.title: 企业主管离职后，苹果将重组销售部门
item.description: 苹果公司负责企业销售和西欧市场的高管计划于今年晚些时候离职，这标志着一位长期管理者的最新离职。【原文：Apple Inc.’s top executive overseeing enterprise sales and the western European market is planning to depart the company later this year, marking the latest exit of a long-tenured manager.】

item.title: 信贷公司湾景探索出售少数股权
item.description: 湾景资产管理公司（Bayview Asset Management）是一家管理着 200 亿美元资金的信贷公司，据知情人士透露，该公司正在探索包括出售少数股权在内的变现方案。【原文：Bayview Asset Management, a credit firm that oversees $20 billion, is exploring liquidity options including the sale of a minority stake, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 前国会议员支持小额债券减税政策
item.description: 一群共和党人站出来支持市政免税，威胁到他们党今年最重要的税收法案可能会增加收入。【原文：A group of Republicans is standing up for the municipal tax-exemption, threatening a possible revenue raiser for their party’s marquee tax bill this year.】

item.title: 西班牙的 Cuerpo 称贝森特表示希望欧盟就关税问题达成协议
item.description: 西班牙经济部长卡洛斯-奎尔波（Carlos Cuerpo）表示，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他希望美国与欧盟就关税问题达成协议。【原文：Spanish Economy Minister Carlos Cuerpo said Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent indicated that he wants a US-European Union deal on tariffs.】
